assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Impro Precision Industries Limited provides casting products and precision machining parts in the Americas, Europe, and Asia. It operates through four segments: Investment Casting, Precision machining and Others, Sand Casting, and Surface Treatment. The company offers components for fuel systems, engine blocks, cylinder heads, and emission systems for distributed energy gas engines; electric fuel injection systems, exhaust systems, transmission systems, and hydraulic orbital motors; components for transmission systems, engine systems, and emission systems for combine harvesters, seeders, and tractors; components for marine engines and steering systems, and components for motorcycle brakes; exhaust gas recirculation systems and turbo chargers; components for EGR systems, body systems, and motor shafts for electric vehicles; and electroplating services for brake systems, fasteners, steering systems, and decorative components for traditional combustion engine vehicles and electric vehicles. It also provides components for air and fuel systems, aircraft engine systems, hydraulic systems, flight control systems, environment control systems, landing control systems, and auxiliary power units; hard chrome plating for air and fuel systems and engine parts, anodizing and chemical film of components for fuel systems, and flight control systems; components for surgical instruments, medical diagnosis equipment, biosystem equipment, and prosthetics and patient handling equipment; and gas turbine combustor end covers, fuel nozzles, oil drilling platform drilling plate drilling, mining drilling tools, and well completion parts and sand control systems. In addition, the company offers plating, anodizing, painting, and coating; and customer maintenance services, as well as manages logistic centers and warehouses. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.
